quest.name: Power to the Vegetables
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol would send you on an errand to Slitherbough.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Use the fertilizer at the vegetable plots.
Deliver the vegetables to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Thanks to Master Valan's kind introduction, we were able to establish friendly relations with the good folk of Slitherbough.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To mark the occasion, we presented them with our special fertilizer. So happy were they with the gift, they asked if they could have more!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Oh yes, we now have an arrangement in place where we provide fertilizer to the settlement in exchange for fresh vegetables.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: If you're not otherwise occupied, MistressMaster Forename, would you mind taking some fertilizer and using it on the crops at Slitherbough? When you have finished, please report to a woman named Ersabel.

dialogue.name: ERSABEL
dialogue.text: Qhoterl Pasol sent you to fertilize our crops, did she? My thanks for your trouble.

dialogue.name: ERSABEL
dialogue.text: I know not how the Qitari make the stuff, but in all my years, I've not seen any fertilizer work as effectively as theirs.

dialogue.name: ERSABEL
dialogue.text: It makes our vegetables grow like a charm, and we're all too happy to share the harvest with our Qitari friends. Please see this delivered to them.

dialogue.name: ERSABEL
dialogue.text: My thanks again for the fertilizer. Please see that the vegetables are delivered to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Welcome back, good madamsir. May I ask if you have the vegetables?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: My, such splendid crops these are, fairly bursting with the land's vitality! They're a blessing from Dalan Himself!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Everyone will be overjoyed for this treat─my dear husband not least of all!
